author: Reuters Editorial
title: Khamenei aide casts doubt on talks with Europeans to save Iran nuclear deal: FARS
text:
LONDON (Reuters) - The top advisor to Iran’s Supreme Leader Ali Khamenei said on Wednesday he doubted Tehran’s talks with European nations to save the nuclear deal after U.S. withdrew from it would be fruitful.
“I doubt that the talks with the Europeans will be fruitful. I hope we see good results, but .... we should become self-sufficient,” Ali Akbar Velayati was Quote: d as saying by Fars news agency.
Reporting by Bozorgmehr Sharafedin; editing by John Stonestreet
